author: mastervampwolf

comments.content:
here we go again!

1. La juventud: Johnson, Sean/Hand Of Sean (Demo) [http://www.dafont.com/hand-of-sean.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104/http:/www.dafont.com/hand-of-sean.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lajuventud1_4331.jpg)
(See "Cuanto mas").

2. El ser humano: ShyFonts Type Foundry/SF Foxboro Script Extended Bold [http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=Foxboro&text=.%20El%20ser%20humano%20.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=Foxboro&text=.%20El%20ser%20humano%20.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elser1_5824.jpg)
  
3. Tan fuerte: Jose Fernandez [http://www.dafont.com/jose-fernandez.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104/http:/www.dafont.com/jose-fernandez.font)
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tanf1_4687.jpg)

(You should ask for a subscription to Dafont...)

3. **[Jose Fernandez](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184104/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Jose%20Fernandez%20-%20Regular&fid=d8aaaec989be0412b5a057667ad2a0f3&fsize=60&text=Tan%20fuerte%20ha%20sido%20todo%2C&wrap=2)** by Jose Fernandez [2008, Free for personal use]
